amendment.description: To provide a point of order against budgets spending more on net interest payments on the debt than on national defense, and to ensure the United States government funds its military at higher levels than the militaries of foreign holders of its debt.

action.text: Amendment SA 373 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Lee.

vote.text: Amendment SA 373 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 73.
